lead_paragraph: The deal, which might be announced as soon as Monday, could be for as much as $20 billion, a person briefed on the discussions said.

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

abstract: Tyco International is in final talks with Johnson Controls concerning merger valued at up to $20 billion.
